item.title: February 25, 2025. Hotfix for an app crash in version 2.9.6
item.description:
Bug fixes
  • Resolved a crash on app launch caused by the error: “Rpc: host not initialized”

item.title: February 13, 2025. Updates and refinements in version 2.9.5
item.description:
With this release, we stopped supporting macOS versions earlier than Big Sur (version 11), including macOS Catalina (version 10.15). On affected operating systems, app versions prior to 2.9.5 will continue to work but will no longer receive updates.

Features and improvements
  • Updated the "Screeners" product list on the New Tab to reflect recent updates to the TradingView Screeners
  • Added symbol syncing to Markets, Symbols and Calendar pages
Bug fixes
  • Fixed an issue where unsupported Iranian and Swedish locales would appear in the app
  • Resolved authentication issues with Pepperstone broker via Facebook
  • Fixed a bug where the Main Menu did not open on the first click
  • Addressed an issue where the context menu of a product on the New Tab only worked on the second click
  • Fixed visual bugs in the titlebar that appeared when tabs were too small
  • Fixed small visual bugs in the Main Menu and the dialogs on the New Tab
  • Resolved an issue where the application would attempt to connect to a proxy server even if its parameters were invalid

item.title: December 12, 2024. Updates and refinements in version 2.9.4
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • Some slight but still important UI improvements across the app
Bug fixes
  • Fixed an issue where the application failed to save the username for the DNSE broker
  • Resolved a permission request error when connecting to the tastytrade broker

item.title: October 17, 2024. News Flow added to the New Tab and other updates in version 2.9.3
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • The New Tab now features a “News Flow” tile, replacing the previous “News” tile and directing users to the News Flow page
  • Revamped the appearance of several icons in the Settings menu
Bug fixes
  • Fixed an issue preventing newly added alert notification sounds from playing
  • Resolved an issue blocking connections to Trade Nation via Apple ID or LinkedIn
  • Fixed a permission request issue when connecting to the HTX broker

item.title: September 04, 2024. Hotfixes in version 2.9.2
item.description:
Bug fixes
  • Fixed permission request issue when connecting to broker Errante
  • Resolved crashes related to:
    - Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'split')
    - Render frame was disposed before WebFrameMain could be accessed

item.title: August 29, 2024. Refinements to the app closing process in version 2.9.1
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • Further refinements to the app closing process to enhance stability
Bug fixes
  • Corrected the tab title for the Bond Screener
  • Resolved crashes related to:
    - SyntaxError: Invalid regular expression

item.title: August 19, 2024. Polishing the New Tab with version 2.9.0
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • Updated the look of the Products section in the New Tab and added new products:
    - Bond Screener and DEX Screener
    - Options
  • Started refining the app closing process to improve stability, with more updates planned
Bug fixes
  • Resolved an issue preventing Google account sign-in to publish a video idea on YouTube
  • Addressed an issue with Google account sign-in for connecting to the “Trade Nation” broker
  • Fixed background shift on the New Tab when there was horizontal scrolling
  • Addressed issues where symbol syncing and saving broker credentials did not work correctly on chart tabs
  • Addressed an issue where the “All layouts” button was missing on the New Tab

item.title: July 9th, 2024. Hotfix in version 2.8.1
item.description:
Bug fixes
  • Fixed an application launch issue that caused the Pine Editor to appear empty and prevented the watchlist from showing up in tabs

item.title: July 1st, 2024. New Tab becomes even newer in version 2.8.0
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • We have revamped the look of the New Tab for a more modern and user-friendly experience, with more focus on the entire family of TradingView products and tools
Bug fixes
  • Fixed the issue with the media permission request when trying to log in to a broker
  • Resolved crashes related to:
    - Render frame was disposed before WebFrameMain could be accessed

item.title: June 6th, 2024. Integrated link handling in version 2.7.8
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • Enabled integrated link handling for all supported locales on Windows (previously available for English locale only). Links to TradingView charts and ideas now bypass the default browser, opening directly within the desktop app for Windows. This change ensures faster access and a more seamless workflow. For more details, please refer to this article.
  • Implemented various under-the-hood improvements to enhance app stability and performance.
Bug fixes
  • Fixed an issue where “out of memory” errors led to app crashes. Now, such errors will only crash the affected tab, leaving the rest of the application unaffected.

item.title: May 9th, 2024. Hotfix for layout loading issue in release 2.7.7
item.description:
Bug fixes
  • Resolved an issue where the last opened layout was incorrectly loaded in all tabs on startup
item.guid: tradingview-desktop#May 9th, 2024. Hotfix for layout loading issue in release 2.7.7

item.title: May 2nd, 2024. Updates and refinements in version 2.7.6
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • Improved the performance of the autosave feature
  • Market data and pricing pages now open in the browser, not in the app
  • Updated the "Screeners" tile on the New Tab to reflect recent updates to the TradingView Screeners
Bug fixes
  • Resolved an issue where the reCAPTCHA can intervene with some pages loading
  • Fixed a freeze that occurred during the autosave process
  • Addressed an issue where the tab header for the "Something went wrong" page was not updating properly
  • Resolved crashes related to:
    - Local service with contracts [undefined] not registered, and remoting not configured, instance cannot be created
    - Object has been destroyed
    - Error in "apply(..\src\communication\services-host)"

item.title: March 13th, 2024. Updates and refinements in version 2.7.5
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • Revamped the look of the main app menu and theme picker
  • Slightly updated the app icon on Windows
  • "Open link from clipboard" now indicates if a copied link can be opened in the desktop application
  • After a fresh installation, both a chart and a "New tab" are opened automatically
  • Clicking the "Screener" tile on the New tab now opens "Stock Screener 2.0"
Bug fixes
  • Resolved authentication issues with brokers through third-party services such as Google, AppleID, and Facebook
  • Addressed the repeated "permission to window-management" dialog in some brokers' authentication windows
  • Fixed the issue where the last tab in a window wasn't closing properly
  • Resolved focus issues with the search field in the New tab
  • Fixed an issue where tabs lost their Symbol Syncing tag after reopening the application
  • Fixed a bug causing unnecessary page reloads when certain pop-ups appear
  • Resolved crashes related to:
    - "@electron/remote" being disabled for WebContents
    - Assertion failure: "Value is null!"
    - Inability to set properties of undefined objects
    - Objects being destroyed unexpectedly
    - Error in "this.saveChangesDialogSub"
    - A series of individual asserts

item.title: February 13th, 2024. Bug fixes and enhancements in version 2.7.4
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • Clicking on the pop-up download toast now opens the downloaded file's directory
  • The download folder path in the "General" tab of "Settings" can now be clicked to open the folder
  • Added translations for various tab titles
  • Enhanced crash handling mechanisms
  • The application now closes without waiting for all tabs to fully load
Bug fixes
  • Fixed incorrect time display in the economic calendar widget on macOS Sonoma for GMT+8 timezone
  • Windows: Resolved an issue where dragging tabs with the primary right mouse button was not functioning
  • Fixed a bug where a separate tab with PineScript would close despite canceling the closure
  • Addressed the issue of links to broker websites opening in the Desktop app instead of the browser
  • Resolved an issue where the application failed to save the selected audio device
  • Fixed instances where the starting splash screen would freeze

item.title: December 21st, 2023. Bug fixes in version 2.7.2
item.description:
Bug fixes
  • Resolved an issue where symbols from real-time subscriptions didn't restore at app launch
  • Fixed instances where the application failed to detect updates
  • Addressed occurrences of crosshair flickering
  • Corrected a bug where a crashed tab would not reload during an unauthorized session
  • Resolved specific crashes related to:
    - Premature disposal of render frame before accessing WebFrameMain
    - Calling addTab on a window that is being closed

item.title: November 22nd, 2023. Bug fixes and enhancements in version 2.7.1
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • Added a new toggle to switch the color theme in the Main Menu
  • Windows only: Removed notification badges from the app icon
  • Release notes now open as an independent page
  • The deletion dialog now displays the number of symbols and drawings in the layout being deleted
Bug fixes
  • macOS: Fixed an issue where the fullscreen area at the top of the screen was unresponsive to hovering and clicks
  • Addressed issue where a long, single-word title extended beyond the bounds of the 'Delete Layout' dialog
  • Resolved crashes related to:
    - SimpleURLLoaderWrapper.emit (Node: Domain)
    - Reading properties of null objects
    - TypeError in next() function within src/services/app-events-service
  • macOS: Resolved crash on update from previous version
  • Corrected the tab title for the ETF Heatmap page

item.title: November 1st, 2023. Improved performance on Intel MacBooks and bug fixes in version 2.6.3
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • Optimized resource/energy consumption on MacBooks with the Intel chip
Bug fixes
  • Fixed issue where "Copy image" didn't save the image to the clipboard
  • Corrected time discrepancies for UTC -6 (Mexico) and UTC+3 (Cairo) time zones
  • Resolved crash in IpcPropertyProxy.apply (src/communication/ipc-proxy)

item.title: September 19th, 2023. Bug fixes in version 2.6.1
item.description:
Bug fixes
  • macOS: Issue encountered when continuously holding down a key in Pine Editor and on the chart
  • Crash: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'toLowerCase')

item.title: September 6th, 2023. In-app proxy settings in version 2.6.0
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • Added in-app proxy server configuration
  • Introduced the ETF Screener on the "New Tab" page
  • Added option for deleting a layout to the chart layout list on the "New Tab" page
  • Clicking "Update Available" now directs you to the "About" tab within "Settings"
  • Various markup improvements on the "New Tab" page
Bug fixes
  • Sharing to social networks for trading in replay mode doesn't work
  • Incorrect zoom value in the Main menu
  • Reload button overlaps text on "Something Went Wrong" page
  • Markup issues on "Sign In" window
  • Empty tab header after first app launch
  • Crash: Render frame was disposed before WebFrameMain
  • Crash: Object could not be cloned

item.title: August 2nd, 2023. Direct opening of TradingView charts and ideas on Windows with version 2.5.0
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • Integrated link handling: Links to TradingView charts and ideas will now bypass the default browser and open directly within the Desktop app for Windows, ensuring a seamless experience. For more details, please refer to this article.
Bug fixes
  • Symbol syncing couldn't be activated when a chart was accessed from the Overview page.

item.title: July 18th, 2023. Bug fixes and minor improvements in version 2.4.1
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • F5 now reloads tabs on Windows and Linux
  • Authentication errors are now displayed directly on the "Sign-in" window
Bug fixes
  • Color tags for symbol syncing are lost after the app restart
  • Main and context menus don't close with Esc
  • Changing locale doesn’t update UI text in "Settings"
  • Ctrl+, may open two "Settings" windows
  • The "Browse" button in "Settings" may occupy two lines
  • The "Video & Audio" tab in "Settings" is missing the video preview
  • is Dark News favicon not visible on the dark theme and other markup issues
  • Error page lacks favicon and tab title
  • Links open in a new tab instead of the current one
  • Incorrect placeholder in tab title during page load
  • Crash: UserService.doSignIn
  • Crash: addTab called for a window that is being closed
  • Crash: Render frame was disposed of before WebFrameMain could be accessed
  • Crash: this.saveChangesDialogSub(index)
  • Crash: Cannot use 'in' operator to search for 'BitsPerPixel'

item.title: June 14th, 2023. New shiny app menus in version 2.4.0
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • New design of app main menu and tab context menu
  • Pin & Unpin tab feature
  • Better app crash handling
  • Crypto Coins & Stock 2.0 Screeners and Economic Calendar on New tab
  • Markup improvements for the Settings dialog
  • New favicons for products and community pages
Bug fixes
  • Alert notification sound isn’t working in some cases
  • Crash: TypeError TrackableMenuWnd.closeOtherTabsFromMenu(index)
  • Crash: Capturer object disposed

item.title: May 10th, 2023. Bug fixes and improvements in version 2.3.4
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • “Close tabs to the right” in the tab context menu
  • “Settings” appears with the previously chosen item
  • New context menu on New tab
  • Markup improvements for Settings, New tab, and Splash
  • Enabling the setting “Hide tabs in full-screen mode” hides tabs immediately (macOS)
Bug fixes
  • Links from the New tab are opened in the browser only in the English locale
  • The Splash screen still gets stuck in some cases
  • Alert notifications are raised at the app launch
  • Crash: read ENOTCONN
  • Crash: write EPIPE

item.title: March 31st, 2023. Fixed app crash on startup in version 2.3.3
item.description:
Bug fixes
  • Crash: Drag service called before process initialization v.2

item.title: March 30th, 2023. Fixed app freezes on startup in version 2.3.2
item.description:
Bug fixes
  • The Splash screen gets stuck during the app launch

item.title: March 28th, 2023. Fixed conflicting keyboard shortcuts in version 2.3.1
item.description:
Bug fixes
  • A few app keyboard shortcuts overlap Pine Editor ones

item.title: March 28th, 2023. Improvements and bug fixes in version 2.3.0
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • Expanding the menu on the New tab
  • F1 opens a new tab with a Help Center page on Windows & Linux
  • Improved Autosave and “Close tab?” dialogs
  • Minor onboarding improvements
  • The “Clear cache” button removes both the app and brokers cache
Bug fixes
  • Windows only: “Share the screen” doesn’t show app windows
  • Double-clicking the “Close tab” button opens a new tab
  • Crash when the system Downloads folder is unavailable
  • Windows only: tab dragging is not working after changing the mouse primary button
  • Crash TypeError: Cannot set properties of undefined (setting ‘offset’)
  • Crash TypeError: Object has been destroyed
  • Crash: EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION_WRITE / 0x24
  • All community links opening in the browser in English
  • Broken link in sharing via Twitter
  • Issues with “systeminformation” library

item.title: February 17th, 2023. Fixed app crash on older versions of macOS in version 2.2.1
item.description:
This update is available for Mac only.

Bug fixes
  • App crashes on High Sierra and Mojave systems

item.title: February 16th, 2023. Onboarding for new users and other improvements in version 2.2.0
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • App onboarding for new users
  • Checking/clearing favorite flags for layouts on the New tab
Bug fixes
  • Alert sound continues playing after closing pop-up notification
  • Heatmaps not saving filters after the app restart
  • Crash: ChangeTab called for a window that is being closed

item.title: February 2nd, 2023. Improvements and bug fixes in version 2.1.0
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • The Quit app button replaces the red cross on the top right when multiple app windows open on Windows and Linux
  • Replaced Snaps & Ideas tiles with Community on the New tab
  • Refreshed “Close/Reload tab” dialogs
  • New tab tooltips
Bug fixes
  • macOS: Ctrl+N not moving the cursor to the next line in the Pine Editor
  • Permission request appearing on opening Binance and BingX authentication
  • No translation in the “Close tab” dialog
  • Windows 11: issue with the focus switching between apps
  • Crash: Drag service called before process initialization
  • Crash: TypeError. Object has been destroyed
  • Linux: Non-default display scaling breaks Settings layout

item.title: December 23rd, 2022. Hotfix for Tab Linking in version 2.0.1
item.description:
Bug fixes
  • Single-chart tab receiving the wrong symbol if linked to multi-chart tab

item.title: December 21st, 2022. In-app volume control and lots of improvements in version 2.0.0
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • In-app volume control for alert sounds
  • TradingView logo on New tab (clickable!)
  • Settings and Help icons on the New tab
  • New splash screens
  • Electron 21.3.0
  • Tooltip improvements and fixes
  • New app crash dialog
Bug fixes
  • RTL issues on Settings
  • New tab page layout issues in different locales
  • Autosave dialog layout issues
  • Toast message layout issues
  • Bitstamp authentication requesting background fetch permission
  • The detached tab was restored in its original window after reopening the closed tab
  • The wrong symbol restored on the multi-layout chart
  • Under-the-hood issues found in 1.0.17
  • Autofill opening Symbol search
  • Tab title appearing with only symbol name after app restart
  • House Rules page ignoring app locale
  • A new window opened in a smaller size when Settings on the screen
  • Ideas with different locales cannot be opened
  • Tools cannot be opened on the New tab when the app window is small
  • Popups not moving with the main window
  • Blinking symbol logo on the app start on macOS
  • Tabs getting hung when drag-and-dropping fast
  • Minimize button not minimizing window in full screen

item.title: October 26th, 2022. Autosave and enhanced performance in version 1.0.17
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • The app saves changes made on charts automatically when quitting
  • Enhanced performance when crosshair sync on
  • New tab: Smoother and faster loading
  • ⌘+⌥+←/→ to switch tabs on macOS
  • New Electron
  • New naming for Screener and News
  • New icons for Screeners/Heatmaps/News/Snaps
  • Social media links to be opened in the browser
Bug fixes
  • Simultaneous playing of alert sounds
  • Window not switching from maximized state to regular on macOS
  • Non-chart pages going mad after several theme changes
  • Cmd+Tab switching not giving application focus
  • Dragging is not working while the tab is loading
  • Restoring the tab with the chart opens a New tab
  • No tab title for the new layout
  • No translation for Screener/Heatmap tab titles
  • Window not restored in maximized state after quitting app when in fullscreen
  • The inactive window cannot be attached to another one
  • Arabic text is not right-aligned
  • The window not switching to fullscreen if Maximize was pressed before
  • “Open link in new tab” opens a new window
  • Feedback: Windows notifications appear delayed
  • The window is not restored in fullscreen after restarting
  • Images not opened through “Open link from clipboard”
  • Something went wrong with the “Something went wrong” page
  • Tab not switching to profile locale after factory reset→sign in
  • New tab: “Make a copy” disappearing after pressing Ctrl
  • The tab bar appearing stops the idea recording
  • Tab bar not appearing in fullscreen
  • New tab refreshing twice on changing locale
  • Wrong navigation on News
  • Scrolling breaks page makeup on Snaps & Markets

item.title: September 15th, 2022. Bug fixes and small improvements in version 1.0.16
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • Improved keyboard navigation in dialog boxes
  • New app menu icon & updated menu contents
  • Replaced Snaps with Ideas on the New tab for non-English locales
  • Increased initial size of the app window
Bug fixes
  • Autoupdate: Tabs not restored after restart if the app was updated
  • The caption of system theme option overlapping element borders
  • No translation in Settings
  • The “Sign in” dialog not opening if previously closed by Enter
  • Scale changing after Ctrl+LCM a link on New tab
  • Settings: button Relaunch flickering
  • Again ▢ on tab bar
  • Logs: Error when cursor moved outside app window
  • Logs: Errors during login with 2FA

item.title: August 17th, 2022. Screener, Heatmap, News, and Snaps are now in TradingView Desktop with version 1.0.15
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • Tiles for screeners, heatmaps, breaking news, and snaps on new tab
  • Keyboard navigation in Settings
Bug fixes
  • App not restoring all windows after the update
  • Tab linking between chart and screener is not working
  • Credentials not saved for Tradier and Dorman Trading & other Auto-fill issues
  • Symbol/interval replaced with ones from the previous layout when switching layout in tab
  • The wrong font in the search bar on the New tab & no character limit
  • Changing locale reverting Zoom setting
  • Tab bar not appearing when scaling is not default on Linux
  • The detached tab overlapped with system buttons when dragging it on macOS
  • Closing alert popup not stopping its sound on Linux
  • Button Browse jumping up on tab switching in Settings
  • Checkboxes flickering in Settings
  • Color theme options do not look good with AR & HE locales in Settings

item.title: August 4th, 2022. Fixed issue with broken sign-in for Korean users in version 1.0.14
item.description:
Bug fixes
  • Authentication through a browser is not working if Windows UI set to Korean
  • Permission request appearing on opening OLX authentication

item.title: July 29th, 2022. Fixed issue when multi-chart layout appeared with a single chart. Version 1.0.13
item.description:
Bug fixes
  • Multi-chart layout appearing with a single chart
item.guid: tradingview-desktop#July 29th, 2022. Fixed issue when multi-chart layout appeared with a single chart. Version 1.0.13

item.title: July 27th, 2022. Symbols and intervals are now restored for multi-chart layouts, too, in version 1.0.12
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • App restores symbols/intervals on tabs with the multi-chart layout
  • New About with a check for available app updates and the option to start the update manually
  • The fresh look of the Layout list on the New tab
  • The “New window” button on tab bar
  • Revised theme switcher in Settings
  • The app follows the system locale until signed in
  • Settings & New tab support RTL locales (AR and HE)
  • Show the ticker and layout name on the window title
Bug fixes
  • Capital.com credentials not saved
  • Saved credentials appearing above the input box
  • Factory reset not clearing saved broker credentials
  • App minimizes when hovering over tabs
  • Closing alert on Triggered Alerts popup closes all alerts
  • Keyboard shortcuts are not working with the Colemak layout
  • App not restoring tickers if too many tabs
  • Settings jumping to center when appearing
  • The unnecessary scrollbar on the dialog “Share screen”
  • Ctrl+<click> opening chart in the same tab
  • Ctrl+<Numpad number> not switching to the selected tab
  • Period key opens Symbol Search not Load layout
  • The active tab is not updated after deleting the layout
  • No checkbox "Sync crosshair across windows" in Settings on Linux
  • Small but annoying ■ on a hovered inactive tab
  • The zoom tooltip not closing after moving the window
  • Settings not closing when clicking House rules or Notices & Ackn.
  • Drop-downs not closed by clicking the arrow
  • Bleached app icon on Apps & features list (Windows)
  • Dialogs blinking on Linux
  • Duplicating the New tab opening tab with the wrong title
  • Too bright separator on dialog “Sign in” on Macs with retina

item.title: July 4th, 2022. Bug fixes and small improvements in version 1.0.11
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • Theme switcher on the app menu
  • “Color theme…” item on the burger menu to call app settings
  • Move “Settings…” higher on the app menu
  • Rename the default theme option to “Use system setting”
  • The “File is saved” toast should disappear faster
  • Ctrl/Cmd+S to save snapshot opened in new tab
Bug fixes
  • Change Interval appears instead of Symbol Search when pressing a letter key
  • The app switches virtual desktops by hovering over tabs on macOS
  • Crash on fullscreen window close
  • Crash on new tab creation in an anonymous session
  • Fullscreen is not activated by pressing F11 once
  • The app closes when an unregistered user opens a new window
  • Settings only appear on the main display
  • Settings appear partially off-screen
  • Alert popup keeps showing after closing the system notification
  • Num lock keys not working as numbers in keyboard shortcuts

item.title: June 20th, 2022. Automatic theme mode and custom tab titles in version 1.0.10
item.description:
Features and improvements
  • Automatic theme mode and in-app theme setting
  • Customizable tab titles
  • Setting for enabling/disabling crosshair sync across app windows
  • Renew Settings UI
  • Improvements to the tab bar in fullscreen mode on Windows
  • Restore symbol, watchlist & color tag on tab reopening
Bug fixes
  • The new tab should appear rightmost
  • Autofill: Saxo broker credentials not saved
  • The tab bar hides on the opening context menu when in fullscreen
  • File saved toast message not translated
  • The browse button in Settings goes ▢ for JP and CN
  • A reopened window appears behind the current window on Linux
  • The tab bar appears after switching tabs in fullscreen on macOS
  • Ctrl+click opens the layout in the current tab
  • Tab flickers on dragging
  • The sound keeps playing after closing the window

item.title: May 25th, 2022. Restoring watchlists in tabs and enhanced full-screen mode in versions 1.0.8 and 1.0.9
item.description:
This update has version number 1.0.8 for Mac&Linux and 1.0.9 for Windows.

Features and improvements
  • Restore watchlists in tabs at the app startup
  • Show the tab bar in full screen on Windows
  • Open TradingView links from the clipboard
  • Shortcut Ctrl/Cmd+, for Settings
  • Custom vertical scroll for non-chart pages on Windows
  • Update to Electron 18
  • New tab: Ctrl/Cmd+<click> to load layout in the background
  • New tab: Reduce tabs jumping on selecting a layout
Bug fixes
  • Crash due to memory leak (new Electron required)
  • App processes are not killed after quitting the app
  • No “Open link in a new window" on the context menu for free users
  • Windows taskbar does not appear when the app is in fullscreen
  • Tab bar delayed appearance after quitting fullscreen

item.title: 1.10.5-dev
item.description:
Read More in What's NewmacOSdmgWindows (64bit)exe
  • Fix error dialog when open md file from Explorer.
  • Support export toPDF with background and dark theme on Windows / Linux.

item.title: 1.10.3-dev
item.description:
• Upgrade mermaid to 11.4.
  • Toggle alert from menubar now follows the same logic as blockquote.
  • Support convert to TextBundle when insert images.
  • Fix file contains some emojis are not detected as UTF-8 encode.
  • Fix window fullscreen / maximize state not restored on Typora restart.
  • Fix typing on last line of code block may make the app hangs.
  • Fix adding anchor link to headings with "+" character not work correctly after export.

item.title: 1.10.2-dev
item.description:
• Upgrade mermaid to 11.3 with new Packet and Architecture diagram and new flowchart shapes.
  • Experiment support for TextBundle now comes to macOS dev version.
  • Add url syntax support for code blocks. This syntax highlight an URL with its procotol, host, port, query and hash.
  • Now all languages can select piclist as the image uploader.
  • Better logic when user select “alert” from menubar, now it will convert selected parts into Github style alerts instead of always insert new one.
  • Allow user to insert images with jfif extension.
  • Show mdx file in sidebar.
  • Fix mouse click on untitled filename in window titlebar not popping up file rename panel on macOS.
  • Fix file contains emoji cannot be correctly auto detected as UTF8 on Windows / Linux.
  • Fix select lists and toggle list type not work as expected.
  • Fix lags when input at the last line of a code block.

item.title: 1.9.2-dev
item.description:
Read More in What's NewmacOSdmgWindows (64bit)exe
  • Add option to render gitlab / github style math block.
    • \
  • Upgrade mermaid library, add Block diagram support.
  • Fix parse rules to handle whitespace in code.
  • Fix anchor id for headers.
  • Other bug fix and improvements

item.title: 1.8.3-dev
item.description:
• Update Update translation for Spanish, French, Galician, Slovenian, Vietnamese and Chinese.
  • Fix cursor position after inputting emoji.
  • Fix github alert icon.
  • Fix math equation export issue for docx.
  • Use empety value for meta tag if referenced variables are undefined in YAML.
  • Fix YAML parse rule when key is quoted.

item.title: 1.8.3-dev
item.description:
Read More in What's NewmacOSdmgWindows (64bit)exeLinux (64bit)debLinux (64bit)tarNew
  • Support github style alert.
  • Add option for zoom and zoom with mouse wheel.
  • Upgrade MermaidJS with XY Chart support.
    • Improvements
  • Linux now support separate theme for light and dark mode.
  • Option to add “New Markdown” menu item in Windows Explorer.
  • Typora now uses mermaid own dark theme when rendering mermaid in dark mode.
  • Improve performance and stability.
  • Fix window position in multiple monitor.
    • Fix
  • Fix save as image for diagrams.
  • Hide “copy as HTML” for unsupported blocks.
  • Add “copy as HTML” support for mermaid diagrams.
  • Fix “PicList not found” error when using PicList to upload images.

item.title: 1.8.1-dev
item.description:
macOSdmgWindows (64bit)exe
  • Fix PDF export on 1.8.0.
  • Add support for Github style alert.
  • Add option to add Markdown item in "New" context menu on Windows explorer.
  • Fix upload images using PicList.
  • Fix "Copy as Image".
  • Hide copy as html when not supported.
  • Other bug fix.

item.title: 1.7.2-dev
item.description:
macOSdmgWindows (64bit)exeRead More in What's New
  • Upgrade mermaid to 10.3.1, supports Sankey diagrams and Quadrant Chart.
  • Add menu item for outline popover.
  • Fix cursor jump after :emoji:.
  • Fix shift + down on task lists.
  • Fix checkbox style on macOS.
  • Fix anchor link related issues.

item.title: 1.7.0-dev
item.description:
Read More in What's NewLinux (64bit)debLinux (64bit)tarNew
  • Add menu item to open outline popover (macOS) and Wordcount popover.
  • Larger scrollbar when hover on Windows/ Linux.
  • Add Modelica language syntax support.
  • Add delete diagram option in context menu.
  • Add options to not save recent folders / files.
  • Add buttons to pin and remove recent folders from sidebar panel.
  • Add variable ${outputFolder} and ${outputFolderName}
    • Improvements and Fix
  • Better paste list from Apple Notes.
  • Improve open file with anchor locations.
  • Fix sort order not saved after restart Typora.
  • Header and footers now respect page margins when export to PDF.
  • Fix exporting ordered list when using theme Whitey.
  • typora-root-url now supports absolute image path on Windows.
  • Fix filename suggestion is improper when first heading is under editing.
  • Fix indent in code blocks not kept when paste into other web apps on macOS.
  • Non-exist #anchor links is now preserved.
  • Disable alert in embeded iframes.
  • Fix shortcut key for upload image cannot be set.
  • Fix drag files from file sidebar on some Linux distributions.
  • Fix app not responsive when do line-wise cut on empty line.
  • Fix some issues about cut line.
  • Fix indent issue when indent paragraph is enabled on macOS ≥ 13
  • Fix improper behavior when press shift + arrow key then press arrow key on macOS.
  • Fix typo of the menu item for Greek encoding option on Windows / Linux.
  • Fix code language autocomplete not work for ~~~.
  • Fix security issue STAR-2023-0062
  • Add menu item of “jump to line start”, fix Ctrl + A/E on macOS.
  • Add batch as alias of BAT in code language selector.
  • Fix some meta data on YAML not get read or applied on export.

item.title: 1.6.4-dev

macOSdmgWindows (64bit)exe

  • Support default code language
  • Bug fix
  • Fix math block on macOS.
  • Fix sometimes Typora cannot open older md file on macOS.

item.title: 1.6.1-dev
item.description:
• Add option to set default file extensions.
  • Add option to control behaviors when drop file or folders into Typora.
  • Improve UI / UX for preferences panel.
  • Fix a mermaid rendering bug.
  • Fix inline math option in preferences cannot be checked.

item.title: 1.6.0-dev
item.description:
macOSdmgWindows (64bit)exe
  • Add options to disable auto link.
  • Add PicList image uploader option.
  • Upgrade to mermaid 10.1, support timeline diagram.
  • Version 1.6 no longer supports Windows 7/8.

item.title: 1.5.4-dev
item.description:
macOSdmgWindows (64bit)exeLinux (64bit)debLinux (64bit)tarRead More in What's New
  • Upgrade mermaid to 9.3, fix some rendering bugs.
    • Originally in 1.5.0-dev
  • Add yara code syntax highlight.
  • Shift + Tab will outdent selected contents in code block and source code mode.
  • Improve syntax highlight in source code mode.
  • Upgrade mermaid version which brings bug fix and MindMaps.
  • Highlight is supported and converted when export to LaTeX.
  • Improve export functions.
  • Add quantity option for image export.
  • Allow open local file link contains “#” in file path.
  • Improve paste results from Google Docs.
  • This version supports Windows 7 again. Now Typora subscribe to different update channel on Windows 7 and newer Windows versions.
  • Link url starts like `C:/` will also be recognized as absolute path on Windows.
  • Better restore icon for unibody style.
  • Add new UI language: Norwegian, and update some other language translations.
  • The dev versions for Windows / Linux now supports TextBundle format as an experimental feature

item.title: 1.4.1-dev
item.description:
macOSdmgWindows (64bit)exeLinux (64bit)debLinux (64bit)tarNew
  • Add copy as image option for math and diagrams.
  • Add option to mix files and folders when sorting in file tree.
  • Add sort by creation time option for file tree / file list.
  • File tree view and file list view now is configured separately.
  • Increase max line count for global search results.
  • Fuzzy search in Open Quickly will now also match folder path.
  • Add new math auto numbering rule — AMS Numbering Rules (where only certain environments produce numbered equations, as they would be in LaTeX).
  • Add option to always add “./” when generating relative path for images.
  • Add rename image in context menu. (Which is the same menu item with move images).
  • Improve Pascal lang support, add more keyword highlight for Pascal.
  • Add syntax support for Smarty.
  • Improve performance when using find function and prevent hangs.
  • Make search result more readable compared to ==highlight== texts.
  • Increase max col count in table edit UI.
  • Now user can select multiple cols and apply text align from table tool tip all at once.
    • Fix
  • Fix bugs about switching files.
  • Fix triple click on code block.
  • Fix code block height not auto changed when enter or exit fullscreen mode on macOS.
  • Make font color of completed task more readable in dark themes
  • Fix some rendering issue for mermaidjs.
  • Remove unnecessary horizontal scroll bar on side bar.
  • Fix undo deleted file not displayed in file tree view.
  • Fix error when switch files.
  • Fix hint behavior when hover on folders of sidebar menu.
  • Use smaller margin between math block and normal paragraphs.
  • Fix compatibility issues when search with Tai.
  • PDF export now supports headers or footers contains non-ASSIC code when export.
  • Improve image export quantity.
  • Fix PDF export not working on Windows when user account contains special characters.
  • Fix epub export show warnings in epub reader when contains video tag
  • Fix page size setting of PDF not working on macOS when export.
  • Fix the setting of margin right and margin left of PDF not correctly applied when export.
  • Fix last export path not saved on macOS.
  • Fix docx import fail on newer pandoc versions.
  • Fix replace may ignore search results matches with regular expressions contains non-capture groups.
  • Fix move images not working for windows.
  • Improve performance when md file contains video tag.
  • Fix a caret jump issue when typing after inline math.
  • Fix minor issues with spellcheck.
  • Update language translations.

item.title: adguardhome-unbound-redis (imthai/adguardhome-unbound-redis)
item.description:
Adguard Home uses unbound as upstream DNS server with prefetch turned on.
Unbound uses redis-server as in-memory data cache.

= THE DEFAULT CREDENTIALS FOR ADGUARD: admin/admin (You can change it in the config/AdGuardHome/AdGuardHome.yaml)
= USE THIS DOCKER WITH A DEDICATED IP OR NETWORK.

item.title: EmBoxd (ghcr.io/computer-geek64/emboxd:latest)
item.description: Provides live integration with Letterboxd for users of self-hosted media servers. It tracks watch activity on the media server and synchronizes Letterboxd user data to match. Changes to a movie's played status are reflected in the user's watched films, and movies that are fully played are logged in the user's diary.

item.title: localstack (localstack/localstack)
item.description:
LocalStack is a cloud service emulator that runs in a single container on your laptop or in
your CI
environment. With LocalStack, you can run your AWS applications or Lambdas entirely on your
local machine without connecting to a remote cloud provider! Whether you are testing complex
CDK applications or Terraform configurations, or just beginning to learn about AWS services,
LocalStack helps speed up and simplify your testing and development workflow.

Connect to the application via console in unraid UI to create resources such as below.

$ awslocal s3api create-bucket --bucket sample-bucket
$ awslocal s3api list-buckets

You may then communicate with the edge port on 4566 (or as configured) to interact with the
services. Some services may generate seperate ports for communication. These can be found in
the documentation.

For more information about this container visit https://www.localstack.cloud/

item.title: DAViCal (fintechstudios/davical:latest)
item.description: DAViCal is a server for calendar sharing. It is an implementation of the CalDAV protocol which is designed for storing calendaring resources (in iCalendar format) on a remote shared server.

item.title: Roundcubemail (roundcube/roundcubemail:latest)
item.description:
Roundcube Mail is an open-source webmail software that offers a user-friendly interface for managing email accounts.
It features a rich text editor, address book, and supports multiple email protocols, making it a popular choice for individuals and organizations seeking a customizable web-based email solution.

item.title: Plex-TVTime (zggis/plex-tvtime)
item.description: Plex-TVTime is a Plex webhook handler that automatically updates your TVTime watch history. TV episodes are automatically marked as watched once you complete them on Plex.

item.title: AnythingLLM (mintplexlabs/anythingllm:latest)
item.description: The all-in-one AI app for any LLM with full RAG and AI Agent capabilities.

item.title: Homebox (ghcr.io/sysadminsmedia/homebox:latest)
item.description: Homebox is the inventory and organization system built for the Home User! With a focus on simplicity and ease of use, Homebox is the perfect solution for your home inventory, organization, and management needs

item.title: mainfrezzer-wireguard-client (ghcr.io/mainfrezzer/wg-bridge:latest)
item.description: Allows you to connect your containers to a dual-stack or even ipv6 only wireguard server. Comes with Privoxy as http proxy (https://www.privoxy.org/) and mircosocks as socks5 proxy (https://github.com/rofl0r/microsocks)

item.title: KitchenOwl-Web (tombursch/kitchenowl-web)
item.description: This is the WebUI for the KitchenOwl Container. You will also need the KitchenOwl Container for this to work. KitchenOwl is a self-hosted grocery list and recipe manager. The backend is made with Flask and the frontend with Flutter. Easily add items to your shopping list before you go shopping. You can also create recipes and add items based on what you want to cook.

item.title: vocechat-server (privoce/vocechat-server:latest)
item.description: VoceChat is the lightest chat server prioritizes private hosting! Easy integratation to your app with our open API!

item.title: casdoor (casbin/casdoor:latest)
item.description:
Casdoor is an open-source, multi-tenant, and cloud-native identity and access management (IAM) solution. It provides a user-friendly interface for managing user authentication and authorization in various applications and systems


Create a app.conf file in the same appdata/casdoor directory, then copy app.conf from https://github.com/casdoor/casdoor/blob/master/conf/app.conf and edit accordingly


default login:
admin
123

item.title: Restreamer (datarhei/restreamer)
item.description:
Datarhei/Restreamer allows smart free video streaming in real time. Stream H.264 video of IP cameras live to your website. Pump your live video to YouTube-Live, Ustream, Twitch, Livestream.com or any other streaming-solutions e.g. Wowza-Streaming-Engine. Our Docker-Image is easy to install and runs on Linux, MacOS and Windows. Datarhei/Restreamer can be perfectly combined with single-board computers like Raspberry Pi and Odroid.

Features:
- User-Interface incl. Basic-Auth
- JSON / HTTP-API
- FFmpeg streamig/encoding the video/camera-stream, creating snapshots or pushing to a external streaming-endpoint
- NGINX incl. RTMP-Module as streaming-backend and hls server
- Clappr-Player to embed your stream on your website
- Docker and Kitematic optimizations and very easy installation

To get a full list of available Variables for the container refert to this page: https://datarhei.github.io/restreamer/docs/references-environment-vars.html

item.title: LogitechMediaServer (snoopy86/logitechmediaserver)
item.description: Logitech Media Server is a streaming audio server supported by Logitech, developed in particular to support their Squeezebox range of digital audio receivers.

item.title: GitLab-CE (gitlab/gitlab-ce)
item.description: GitLab Community Edition docker image based on the Omnibus package.

item.title: beatbump (snuffydev/beatbump:latest)
item.description: Beatbump is a fully-featured music listening experience, while helping to ease your privacy concerns associated with other platforms.

item.title: Profilarr (santiagosayshey/profilarr:latest)
item.description: Configuration management tool for Radarr/Sonarr that automates importing and version control of custom formats and quality profiles.

item.title: Profilarr (santiagosayshey/profilarr:latest)
item.description: A custom format / quality profile management tool that acts as a middleman between a configuration database and your Radarr/Sonarr installations

item.title: keycloak (bitnami/keycloak:latest)
item.description: Open Source Identity and Access Management.

item.title: NadekoBotV6 (ghcr.io/nadeko-bot/nadekobot:v6)
item.description:
Based on the offical image created for the v6 version of nadeko bot.

All your DB files and Creds needs to be in the root of the "Nadeko" folder if migrating from older version make sure you are on 5.3.9 or it will fail.
I had issues starting with other files present in the folder so it's probably best to not import anything else

item.title: February 2025 - Shared Spaces
item.description:
WebCatalog Business users can now create shared spaces, enabling teams to collaborate effortlessly by accessing and managing the same spaces together.

Shared spaces work just like regular spaces, with one key difference: all data—including subspaces, bookmarks, and settings—is synchronized and shared across the entire team.

item.title: January 2025 - Smarter, Faster Search Experience
item.description:
Search has always been central to WebCatalog, helping you quickly find and explore apps. However, as WebCatalog grew, search didn't always keep up—it could feel slow, unreliable, and less helpful than it should be.

We've completely rebuilt the search system to be faster, more dependable, and powered by advanced AI technology. Now, with AI-driven language models, search is smarter and more intuitive, delivering better results and more accurate app suggestions.

This update also sets the stage for exciting new features that will make discovering and managing apps even easier. Stay tuned!

Important: To keep using search, update WebCatalog Desktop to version 62+ and all apps, games, and spaces to Photon version 53+. Older versions will soon lose search functionality due to major infrastructure changes.

Improved App Update Notifications

We've improved how update notifications work based on your feedback. While updates are essential for bringing you new features and keeping your installed desktop apps and spaces secure, we understand that receiving frequent update notifications can be disruptive.

To make this better, we've reduced the frequency of update notifications and added new customization options:

  • Choose to receive notifications for all updates, only major updates, or turn them off entirely.
  • By default, you'll only receive notifications for major updates.

You can adjust these settings in App/space settings > General > App update notifications.

Additionally, you can customize the app update reminder on the toolbar by going to app/space settings > Appearance > Show app update reminder on toolbar.

item.title: December 2024 - Subspace Bar Customization
item.description:
We've introduced new customization options for the subspace bar, allowing you to tailor it to your preferences:

  • Customize the subspace captions (the text appears under the name of each subspace) on the subspace bar. Options include showing keyboard shortcuts, URLs, hostnames, or hiding captions entirely.
  • You can now hide the "Add Subspace" button on the subspace bar.

You can change these settings in App/Space Settings > Appearance.

item.title: November 2024 - Google Drive Integration
item.description:
WebCatalog Desktop now works with the official Google Drive desktop sync client for macOS and Windows. This integration allows you to open Google Drive files (Docs, Sheets, Slides, Drawings, and Forms) directly in corresponding desktop apps.

To open Google Drive files with any installed desktop apps or spaces.

  • Use the "Open with" options in Windows Explorer (Windows) or Finder (macOS).
  • Within any desktop app, select File > Open File... from the menu bar.

You can also set WebCatalog's desktop apps (like Google Docs) or spaces as the default applications for opening Google Drive files by following one of these guides:

  • Set default app for a file type
  • Set default app for a file type

Dashboard

Each space and desktop app now has a dashboard that gives you a quick overview of your subspaces—like apps, games, and accounts—making it easier to access and manage everything in one place.

You can switch it on or off anytime in App/Space Settings > Subspaces > Dashboard.

item.title: September 2024 - Singlebox
item.description:
Based on customer feedback and careful consideration, we're excited to reintroduce the standalone Singlebox app.

The standalone Singlebox app functions much like a space—bringing together all your web apps, messaging services, and emails into one convenient window. However, it can be installed independently of WebCatalog Desktop, with automatic app updates. You can also install it alongside WebCatalog Desktop without any conflicts.

Singlebox shares the same account system and cloud storage as WebCatalog and is included in the WebCatalog subscription, giving you seamless access to both products under a single plan.

item.title: August 2024 - Startup Page
item.description:
You can now choose whether apps, spaces, and subspaces open on the home page or continue where you left off at startup. This setting can be customized for the entire app, game, or space, as well as for individual subspaces.

Team Library

Share apps (including custom apps) and games with your team members (only available for WebCatalog Business subscription).

Enhanced Auto-Reload

We've rebuilt the auto-reload feature to make it more reliable. Now, you can enable auto-reload for the entire app, game, or space, as well as for individual subspaces.

item.title: July 2024 - Mousewheel Zoom
item.description:
On Windows, you can now zoom in and out of a page by holding down the Ctrl key and scrolling up or down with your mousewheel.

Proxy Authentication

WebCatalog now supports proxy servers that require authentication with a username and password. You can save your proxy credentials in settings.

item.title: June 2024 - Private Browsing
item.description: Private Browsing is a new mode that enhances your privacy by not saving your browsing information, such as history and cookies. Once you end the session, no traces of your activity are left behind. You can turn it on in app/game/space's settings > Security & Privacy > Private Browsing.

item.title: April 2024 - Improved Update Experience
item.description:
WebCatalog Desktop now automatically closes running apps, games, and spaces during updates. Once the updates are complete, it seamlessly relaunches them.

Secure DNS (DNS over HTTPS (DoH))

Make it harder for people with access to your internet traffic to see which sites you visit with DNS over HTTPS (DoH). You can turn it on in app/game/space's settings > Security & Privacy > Secure DNS.

item.title: March 2024 - Bookmarks
item.description:
Create bookmarks so WebCatalog can remember your favorite and frequently visited links.

Browsing History

Keep track of the websites or web pages that you have visited.

item.title: January 2024 - Subspace Icon Set
item.description:
Customize your subspace icons with 1000+ icons in our new beautiful icon set.

Download Manager

Manage, pause and resume downloads with the new download manager.

item.title: December 2023 - Dansk, עִבְרִית, Svenska, ภาษาไทย, українська
item.description: WebCatalog is now available in Danish, Hebrew, Swedish, Thai, Ukrainian.
item.guid: webcatalog-December 2023-Dansk, עִבְרִית, Svenska, ภาษาไทย, українська

item.title: November 2023 - العربية, Bahasa Indonesia, 한국어, Norsk (bokmål), Nederlands, Polski, Pyccкий, Türkçe, 中文（繁體）
item.description:
WebCatalog is now available in Arabic, Indonesian, Korean, Norwegian (bokmal), Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Chinese (traditional).

Theme Colors

We've brought back the ability to customize your apps, games, spaces and subspaces with colors with more color choices and improved experience.

Deutsch, Español, Français, Italiano, 日本語, Português, 中文（简体）

WebCatalog is now available in German, Spanish, French, Italian, Japanese, Portugese, and Chinese (simplified).
item.guid: webcatalog-November 2023-العربية, Bahasa Indonesia, 한국어, Norsk (bokmål), Nederlands, Polski, Pyccкий, Türkçe, 中文（繁體）

item.title: October 2023 - Redesign
item.description: WebCatalog app and websites have been redesigned with a brand new unified design.

item.title: September 2023 - Subspace Folders
item.description:
You can now group subspaces together by dragging a subspace over another one on the subspace bar.

Subspace folders are automatically backed up and synced across devices. (only for WebCatalog Pro users)

Tiếng Việt

WebCatalog is now available in Vietnamese.
